message.content:
cs.EM, cs.AR, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.EM (Embedded Systems): The paper discusses fault-tolerance for on-board computers (OBCs) in miniaturized satellites, which are embedded systems. 
- cs.AR (Architecture): The paper proposes a multi-stage approach for fault-tolerant general-purpose computing with modern multiprocessor-SoCs (MPSoCs) for spaceflight, which involves architectural considerations. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses software-based fault-tolerance concepts and presents software implementations that were achieved and tested. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper mentions coarse-grained thread-level distributed self-validation as one of the FT stages in the proposed approach. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses mixed criticality as one of the FT stages in the proposed approach, which involves control systems.
